title: S1 Ep28: The Million Dollar Paranormal Challenge - Hr.1
itunes:title: The Million Dollar Paranormal Challenge - Hr.1
description: Darkness Radio hosts a faceoff of sorts in this episode as we welcome paranormal skeptic, magician, and leader of JREF, "The Amazing Randi", James Randi. and Paranormal Radio show host and EVP specialist, Lou Gentile!  James Randi as part of the James Randi Education Foundation, hosts a Million Dollar Paranormal Challenge to anyone who can step up and scientifically reproduce their paranormal abilities on command.  Lou Gentile claims that he can reproduce that in a lab setting.  And we are hosting an hour long forum as to why it hasn't happened yet...
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
